i.d: ["843","106","1-1","3.2","Wrote it down and read it out, hopin' it would save me\n执笔写下 轻声默念 期盼它能救我于水火",0,0,"52","318",500,0,1,"SimHei",true]
["843","106","1-1","3.2","(Too many times, too many times)\n（太多次 已经太多次）",0,0,"52","318",500,0,1,"SimHei",true]
["843","106","1-1","3.2","Talkin' in my sleep at night, makin' myself crazy\n夜晚睡梦中的呓语 让我陷入癫狂",0,0,"52","318",500,0,1,"SimHei",true]
["843","106","1-1","7","My love, he makes me feel like nobody else, nobody else\n我的爱人 他让我陷入非他不可的执念",0,0,"52","318",500,0,1,"SimHei",true]
["843","106","1-1","7","But my love, he doesn't love me, so I tell myself, I tell myself\n但是我的爱人 他并不爱我 我告诉自己 劝告着自己",0,0,"52","318",500,0,1,"SimHei",true]
["843","106","1-1","2","One: Don't pick up the phone\n第一 别接他的电话",0,0,"52","318",500,0,1,"SimHei",true]
["843","106","1-1","2.5","You know he's only callin' 'cause he's drunk and alone\n你知道他只会在烂醉孤寂之时打来电话",0,0,"52","318",500,0,1,"SimHei",true]
["843","106","1-1","2","You'll have to kick him out again\n你必须将他再次逐出\n",0,0,"52","318",500,0,1,"SimHei",true]
["843","106","1-1","2.5","You know you're gonna wake up in his bed in the morning\n你知道有天清晨你终会在他的床上醒来\n",0,0,"52","318",500,0,1,"SimHei",true]
["843","106","1-1","2.5","And if you're under him, you ain't gettin' over him\n若你此刻顺随与他 你便永远无法将他摆脱",0,0,"52","318",500,0,1,"SimHei",true]
["843","106","1-1","2","Three: Don't be his friend\n第三 别当他所谓的朋友\n",0,0,"52","318",500,0,1,"SimHei",true]
我是第一，真心棒，素质3连
打破120播放俩弹幕尴尬局面，再说一句，呼叫计数君
